dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ssu.tag_2,'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM')) mo, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ssu.tag_2,'MM/DD/YYYY'),'YYYY')) yer, ssref1.refnum_value transloader, sref2.shipment_refnum_value commodity, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ssu.tag_2,'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MON') mth, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ssu.tag_2,'MM/DD/YYYY'),'YYYY') yr, COUNT(ssu.s_ship_unit_xid) total_boxes, loc1.location_name gateway, cc.country_name destination, sprov.servprov_xid ssl FROM s_ship_unit ssu INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d sstopd ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = sstopd.s_ship_unit_gid AND sstopd.stop_num = 1 INNER JOIN shipment s ON sstopd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_refnum ssref1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssref1.s_ship_unit_gid AND ssref1.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.TRANSLOADER LOCATION NAME' INNER JOIN servprov sprov ON s.servprov_gid = sprov.servprov_gid INNER JOIN location loc1 ON s.source_location_gid = loc1.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc2 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc2.location_gid INNER JOIN country_code cc ON loc2.country_code3_gid = cc.country_code3_gid WHERE s.domain_name = 'SCOULAR/BCO' AND ssu.s_ship_unit_xid LIKE 'S%' AND sref1.shipment_refnum_value IN ('2083','2084','2184','2185','3311','5071','5078','5531','2200') AND (TO_DATE(ssu.tag_2,'MM/DD/YYYY') >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) - (TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'DD')) - 1) AND TO_DATE(ssu.tag_2,'MM/DD/YYYY') <= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')) - (TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(:END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'DD')) - 1), 1) -1) GROUP BY TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ssu.tag_2,'MM/DD/YYYY'),'YYYY')), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ssu.tag_2,'MM/DD/YYYY'),'YYYY'), TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ssu.tag_2,'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM')), TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ssu.tag_2,'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MON'), ssref1.refnum_value, sref2.shipment_refnum_value, loc1.location_name, cc.country_name, sprov.servprov_xid ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ssu.tag_2,'MM/DD/YYYY'),'YYYY')), TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ssu.tag_2,'MM/DD/YYYY'),'MM')), ssref1.refnum_value, sref2.shipment_refnum_value, loc1.location_name, cc.country_name, sprov.servprov_xid
